## Pre-bootcamp survey

Please complete this anonymous (and light-hearted) [survey](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSeGqic9Hrj-XvkESZmu_0t6H02R-U6yzYnRLuX6HDFDp4R39g/viewform).
We'll use the data drawn from it to show how one can use R and R Markdown to create reproducible data processing workflows like [this](talks/bootcamp-survey.html) and even full manuscripts like [this](talks/gilmore-hallquist-bootcamp-2018-papaja.pdf).
